vrbuaacn wrote:
> Hi,all
>   I am using heritrix 1.6.0 on Windows 2000 professional and met a
> problem when create a new job and start crawling. The local-
> errors.log showed the following message:
>
>   2005-12-22T03:07:45.281Z    -2          - http://xx.xx.xx/ - - no-
> type #002 - - -
> java.io.IOException: Failed to get host vrlab.buaa.edu.cn address
> from ServerCache

Does it happen for all hosts or just 'vrlab.buaa.edu.cn'?  Can you 
reproduce?
St.Ack
